title: We Learn to Swim
subtle: Realistic (fiction), 66 words, Level C (Grade K), Lexile 230L
description: We Learn to Swim is a story about a group of children who are learning the many different skills they need to swim. The repetitive text pattern and colorful, descriptive illustrations support emergent readers. This book can also be used to teach students how to understand sequence of events, as well as to connect to prior knowledge to better understand text.
meta: dunk, float, learning, paddle, practice, swim
Connect to prior knowledge to understand text
Sequence Events : Identify sequence of events
Initial Consonants : Discriminate initial consonant /l/ sound
Concept Words : Identify the days of the week

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
